entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Flurries or a few rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
